titleStmt.title: The second part and knitting vp of the boke entituled Too good to be true Wherin is continued the discourse of the wonderfull lawes, commendable customes, [and] strange manners of the people of Mauqsun. Newely penned and published by Thomas Lupton.
Too good to be true. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Binneman. Anno Domini. 1581. Cum priuilegio. Septembris 6,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 of "Too good to be true".
